name: Padis Campsite
summary: Located in the heart of Apuseni Natural Park, this campsite is perfect for nature lovers.
description: Padis Campsite is situated in a beautiful meadow surrounded by forest. It has a total of 10 pitches and is equipped with toilets and showers. The campsite is an excellent starting point for hiking trails and exploring the local caves.

name: Bran Camping
summary: Experience the beauty of Transylvania at Bran Camping.
description: Bran Camping is located in the village of Bran, just a short walk from Bran Castle. The campsite has 15 pitches and is equipped with toilets, showers, and a kitchen. It's an excellent base for exploring the Transylvania region.

location.address: Strada General Traian Mosoiu, Bran 507025, Romania

name: Camping Turist
summary: Camping Turist is located in the heart of Transylvania and offers a peaceful retreat for those who want to escape the hustle and bustle of the city.
description: This camping site is perfect for those who want to explore the nearby castles and medieval towns. The facilities include clean bathrooms, showers, and a small restaurant that serves traditional Romanian food.

location.address: Strada General Alexandru Averescu, Sibiu 550001, Romania

name: Camping Rarau
summary: Camping Rarau is located in the beautiful Ceahlau Mountains and offers amazing views of the surrounding landscape.
description: This camping site is perfect for those who love to be surrounded by nature. It offers various hiking trails and outdoor activities, such as rock climbing and mountain biking. The facilities include clean bathrooms, showers, and a small grocery store.
